para1: The Training and Placement Office of IIT Indore handles all activities related to the campus placement of the graduating batch, which includes interacting with the HR representatives of corporate organizations, arranging necessary infrastructure to conduct the placement drive, and conducting and holding the on and off campus placements.
para2: The Office is managed by a motivated and dedicated team consisting of the Head-Training & Placement, the staff, and the student representatives of each discipline
para3: The team ensures that it invites reputed companies to our college that can provide desired placement offers to students based on their personal fields of interest.
para4: It also tries to assist the recruiters in every possible aspect, making the placement drive run smoothly and efficiently.
